Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As they neared the Ark, Teletran's defenses fired up. Detecting the group 
nearby.

First an alert went to Maxima, then the defense batteries - 2 turrets - at 
the end of the Ark - appeared & prepared for the intruders. A tough shield 
however appeared around the command room/bridge.

A quick alert rang throughout the Ark, then went silent but the lights still 
flashed.

--part1_128.2b4b31b4.2c0cb3e7_boundary
